= Paths editing =

If you have the need to define a path external to application  for the configuration file and/or for the xml mapping file, just use the *Path* class.

Definition of the path to the configuration file:

{{{
Path.setCfg("path/cfg.properties");
}}}

Definition of the path to the XML file:

{{{
Path.setXml("path/jmapper.xml");
}}}
